name: Cthildha
description:
Made for GMC Jam 42 in 4 days.

Cthildha is a game that puts story above everything else. It only takes 5-7 minutes to experience everything the game has to offer, so I hope you'll stick it out to the end!

CONTROLS:

These are explained more or less in the game, but here you go.

Arrow keys, WASD - Tap to move (don't hold down the buttons)

1 - Pay 10 spark to create a small planet.

2 - Pay 200 spark to create a medium planet.

3 - Pay 3,000 spark to create a large planet.

BASIC GAMEPLAY:

Use the spark to create planets. The planets spawn more spark. Fun creative cycle.

I hope you enjoy that 38 Quadrillion possibilities of randomly generated planets in this game!
